results.title: [U.S. of A.]
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Four corners (Television program)”
“Is this the way for future factories?” Documentary about a different sort of factory in the USA - Sol Air Corp - where there are no foremen or organised workforce, no production targets, average wages but many staff benefits including cheap petrol, medical and dental schemes and recreational facilities.

results.title: [Turkey: agriculture]
results.brief_description:
A documentary on Turkish agriculture showing how machinery for farming has only recently been introduced although more primitive methods still persist. Shows tobacco farming; the farming and processing of figs and raisins; State Agriculture Institute and their interest in improving livestock; veterinary school with its own radio station; annual agriculture fair.
NB: Reel 2 only
